Special Powers
(+5 POINTS) SWORD BEARER: This character starts the game with up to any two distinct Sword equipment equipped.
GAZE OF THE GORGON: Exploit Weakness. // FREE: Choose an adjacent opposing character and roll a d6. 4-6: Give that character an action token.

September 10, 2022
Coyote's Own
Rules question, rules forum, terrible formatting in the units section comments, etc. Now on to the question. All of the swords say: "Blades/Claws/Fangs. When this character uses it". "It" refers to B/F/C granted by a given sword. If they were active on any usage of B/F/C the train would "When this character uses Blade/Fangs/Claws" rather than "When this character uses it." So he has to choose which sword he will be using. And this all will turned into one blob of text in the comments section.
